name: VascularAccessForDialysis
title: Vascular Access for Dialysis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for accessing the vascular system for dialysis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent procedures related to accessing the vascular system for dialysis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
